channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 副总统卡马拉-哈里斯呼吁加沙停火，并敦促哈马斯接受释放以色列人质以换取暂时停战的潜在协议
item.description:
Vice President Kamala Harris called for a Gaza cease-fire and urged Hamas to accept a potential deal to release Israeli hostages in exchange for the temporary truce https://t.co/trNkxesOse https://t.co/trNkxesOse

item.title: 宅在家里的闺蜜们在 TikTok 上上传了大量关于自我保健、烹饪、清洁的视频，以及对传统婚姻的理想化憧憬--少了结婚戒指

item.title: 当之无愧的好莱坞最佳着装奖得主不是瑞恩-高斯林（Ryan Gosling），也不是杰里米-艾伦-怀特（Jeremy Allen White）。而是马蒂-马西森（Matty Matheson），这位从纹身到指甲的厨师变成了明星。
item.description:
It’s not Ryan Gosling or Jeremy Allen White who deserves the title of best dressed in Hollywood right now. It’s Matty Matheson, the tattooed-to-the-fingernails chef turned star. https://t.co/4l1LX0hBhL https://t.co/4l1LX0hBhL

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 4, 2024

item.title: 不受欢迎死而复生微软的 "Clippy "正风靡一时。这个虚拟助手是一个以打岔而闻名的动画回形针，现在已经拥有了一批追随者。
item.description:
Unwanted. Unloved—back from the dead. Microsoft's “Clippy” Is having a moment. The virtual assistant, an animated paper clip known for interrupting, now has a cult following of fans. https://t.co/POOSFNeinn https://t.co/POOSFNeinn

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 4, 2024

item.title: 在 Apple TV+ 的新喜剧《Palm Royale》中，1969 年代的社会奋斗者与棕榈滩的精英们在精心设计的布景中发生冲突，任何装饰狂都会爱不释手。
item.description:
In Apple TV+'s new comedy "Palm Royale," circa-1969 social strivers clash with Palm Beach elites amid carefully designed sets that any decor nut will devour https://t.co/Lm6yJyDgK5 https://t.co/Lm6yJyDgK5

item.title: 在当今的 "勾搭 "文化中，性的竞争环境并不公平，但假装公平却符合男性的利益。路易丝-佩里写道，女性有权愤怒。
item.description:
In today’s hookup culture the sexual playing field is not even, but it suits men’s interests to pretend that it is. Women are entitled to be angry, writes Louise Perry. https://t.co/1YebpX0hKO https://t.co/1YebpX0hKO

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 4, 2024

item.title: 杜卡迪北美公司的Jason Chinnock驾驶2021年款吉普牧马人Rubicon 392，以两轮换四轮的方式进行越野探险。
item.description:
Jason Chinnock of Ducati North America trades two wheels for four on off-road adventures in his 2021 Jeep Wrangler Rubicon 392 https://t.co/T1rBqTFLML https://t.co/T1rBqTFLML

item.title: 跳过平庸的手表吧，伙计们。这六款酷炫奇特的手表，包括全黑款和史蒂夫-麦奎因（Steve McQueen）钟爱的方形款式，一定会让你眼前一亮，引来赞美之词。
item.description:
Skip the predictable watches, guys. These six coolly quirky models—including all-black takes and a square style favored by Steve McQueen—will turn heads and draw compliments. https://t.co/7jYiH6j9k1 https://t.co/7jYiH6j9k1

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 4, 2024

item.title: 巴塞罗那椅伊姆斯休闲椅和长椅。经典，但过于夸张，被无情地淘汰，令人疲倦。是时候考虑一下这些设计师认可的、同样别致的替代品了。
item.description:
The Barcelona Chair. The Eames Lounge Chair and Ottoman. Classic, but overexposed, relentlessly knocked-off and just tired. It's time to consider one of these designer-approved, equally chic alternatives. https://t.co/MkVOaDqI11 https://t.co/MkVOaDqI11

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 3, 2024

item.title: 精英圈子里的职场妈妈们对魔幻蘑菇赞不绝口。"在我接触的每10位女性中，就有8位在服用迷幻剂"

item.title: 本周新闻紧张刺激的托尼奖获奖剧目《怀疑》重返百老汇，阿丽亚娜-格兰德在新专辑中提出 "是的，然后呢？"的问题，神奇宝贝进入新时代等。
item.description:
Happening this week: The tense, Tony-winning play "Doubt" returns to Broadway, Ariana Grande asks "Yes, And?" on a new album, Pokémon enters a new era and more https://t.co/Pq290EC9te https://t.co/Pq290EC9te

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 3, 2024

item.title: 一场强劲的暴风雪导致一条主要高速公路关闭，数千人断电，而在此之后，加利福尼亚州即将迎来更多的降雪。
item.description:

item.title: 双因素代码说得好听点是不方便，说得难听点就是危险。@nicnguyen 为您提供了一份处理这一绝对必要的安全层的无忧指南。
item.description:

item.title: 这种全身训练可以让你获得所需的有氧运动和力量训练，而无需在健身房里耗费大量时间。这种循环训练是美国职业足球联盟（MLS）洛杉矶银河队在季后赛中的主要训练手段。
item.description:
This full-body workout can get you the cardio and strength training you need without taking forever at the gym. This circuit training is a key offseason tool for the Los Angeles Galaxy of the MLS. https://t.co/bI1wqXdiiM https://t.co/bI1wqXdiiM

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 3, 2024

item.title: 在梅西百货连锁店陷入困境后，一个寻求收购梅西百货的投资集团将报价提高了近 10 亿美元，因为之前的报价太低遭到了拒绝。
item.description:
